pageContext.claim: “We have a large African American population and they really appreciate what I'm doing and they've let me know it. They really appreciate it. And, by the way, the numbers just came out.”
pageContext.analysis: It's simply not credible that the "African-American population" contacted the White House and expressed gratitude for Trump's performance. Every poll shows Trump has extremely low approval ratings among blacks. Approval among black Americans has hovered around 10 percent over the course of Trump’s presidency, according to Gallup polling, with 8 percent approving in June. A Quinnipiac University poll found that 80 percent of registered African American voters think Trump is racist.
